#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   while(1)
{
int a,b,m,count=0,carry=0;
cin>>a;
cin>>b;
if(a==0 && b==0)
{
    break;
}
else
{
    while(a>0 || b>0)
    {

        m=(a%10)+(b%10)+carry;
        if(m>9)
        {
         carry=m/10;
         count++;
        }
        else
        carry=0;

        a/=10;b/=10;

    }
    if(count==0)
    cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
    else if(count==1)
    cout<<"1 carry operation."<<endl;
    else
    cout<<count<<" carry operations."<<endl;

}

}

return 0;
}
